duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide financial expertise and business support to designated business area to achieve key objectives.
Guide management on financial-related matters and decisions.
Manage daily financial inquiries for designated business area.
Contribute to development and execution of business team priorities by participating in joint issue identification, analysis, and resolution.
Lead the preparation of financial forecasts and budgets, including risk identification and negotiation of key operational metrics.
Perform periodic analyses of variances and prepare presentations of budget and forecast information.
Address issues, identify opportunities to improve processes and practices.
Support monthly reviews and periodic business planning sessions, evaluating financial and operational results.
Identify and analyze various investments and substantiate rationale for projects through business case developments.
Directly manage team members, including hiring, developing, motivating, and directing people.
Participate in medium-term and strategic planning for the assigned business area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and at least 2 years of experience in an analytical role in finance, accounting, business management, quantitative analysis, or economics OR High School Diploma/GED and at least 5 years of experience in an analytical role in finance, accounting, business management, quantitative analysis, or economics.
At least 2 years of experience identifying operational issues and recommending/implementing strategies to resolve issues and problems.
At least 2 years of experience in analytics principles (Statistics, Mathematics, Operations Research, Business Management, Economics, or Finance).
At least 2 years of experience with project management.
Experience working as the financial liaison on a business team.
Experience using time management skills, prioritizing/organizing, tracking details, and meeting deadlines of multiple projects.
Intermediate level skill in Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.
At least 1 year of experience in direct leadership, indirect leadership, and/or cross-functional team leadership.
Willing to travel up to 5% of the time for business purposes within state and out of state.
